name: DUCK TED BUNDY
description:
"Get inside the mind of a killer… kill all the ducks… don't ask why…"

FEATURES:

  • Over 6,000 words of hyper literary fiction text!
  • Cutting edge realistic photos of ducks!
  • Hair-raising action sequences!
  • MURDER!!

What the 'pros' have to say:

"DUCK TED BUNDY is a story of repetition.
It is a story where our protagonist faces the same situation many times over and determinedly picks himself back up again.
It is a story of the will to move forward, even if only a little.
It is a story of the resolve to want to be near ducks, even though it is frightening to have contact with ducks and to endure ambiguous loneliness."

– Hideaki Anno, GameInformer
